docs.text: Welcome to cvlib documentation cvlib is a simple, high level, easy to use, open source Computer Vision library for Python. It was developed with a focus on enabling easy and fast experimentation. Being able to go from an idea to prototype with least amount of delay is key to doing good research. Guiding principles of cvlib are heavily inspired from Keras (deep learning library). simplicity user friendliness modularity and extensibility This documentation is currently a work in progress. For now, to know more about what cvlib can do please visit the github repository.
docs.title: Home
